svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/69.0.3497.100 Safari/537.36" version="9.1.8" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram id="f995344f-91a3-2a91-884c-60af8dc02b27" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 95px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 107px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 72px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 284px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font: MYSQL DB works as a Cache store and stores news headlines. The cache gets invalidated every hour. The search results from the App are not cached.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 171px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font: Newsquirrel is powered by NewsAPI and feeds all the data that it needs to run

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 217px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font: IFramely provides snippets of information for a url. this is primarily used by the quickview feature

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 90px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 92px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 92px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 100px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 88px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 156px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font: A GraphQL Endpoint that works as a ORM layer for the MYSQL DB

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 336px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font:
PM2 is a production process manager for Node.js.
A PM2 Cluster runs multiple instances of the Apollo server and manages all the node process.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 72px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 336px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.span: Apollo graphql servers are the brains of the Application server stack.They are responsible for fetching the data and managing the cache store.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 284px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font: The Front end application(React/Apollo client) is hosted by the NGINX and is theÂ gateway to the Newsquirrel application

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 78px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 126px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font: NGINX works here as a Proxy and HTTPS enabler for the API
